# Gross Domestic Product of Pernambuco in 2013
```{r}
# Reads data
gdp <- read.csv2(file = "data/gdp_geo.csv")

# Normalizes GDP data from 1 to 30
radius_gdp <- 29 * (gdp$GPD_per_capita - min(gdp$GPD_per_capita)) /
  (max(gdp$GPD_per_capita) - min(gdp$GPD_per_capita)) + 1

# Creates and displays map
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  fitBounds(-40, -4, -31, -8) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = gdp$long, lat = gdp$lat, color = "red", 
                   radius = radius_gdp, options = )
my_map
```
